text: 18.2 Lom 16.3, 1 Ko 16.19, 2 Ti 4.19 Amɨl nɨgak, bɨ Juda olap, Podus plopens nɨb ap yek. Yɨb ne ak Akwila, bin ne yɨb ak Plisila. Bɨ bel anɨb ak, kɨli am yelɨgɨpil man Yitali, taun Lom wulep okok. Kɨli anɨgɨl am yelɨgɨpil ak pen, ñɨn anɨb ak Lom gapman bɨnonɨm Klodiyus, Juda ogɨnap Lom ak ma yenɨgel agak ak nɨm, ap taun Kolin anɨb ak yelek.
